title.rendered: Alticor Inc Awarded the Integrated Capabilities Office (ICO) at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station, Florida

content.rendered:
The United States Army Corps of Engineers (USACE) Mobile District awarded Alticor Inc Southeast District the $76 Million ICO project at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station, Florida.

This design-build project is for the design and construction of a two-story building, parking area and a supporting Utility Area building, which consists of a Central Utility Plant and Industrial Shop area.

The project kicks off in September 2022 and is estimated to have a scheduled completion date of April 2025.
